rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, menace
Whenever Reimu and Yukari attacks, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature with power less than Reimu and Yukari's. Put it on the battlefield tapped and attacking, then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
notes:

!tag Reimu
